SELECT last_insert_id()
INSERT INTO document_default( emp_no, doc_title, doc_content, category, writer, reference, receiver_team, doc_status, doc_stamp1, doc_stamp2, doc_stamp3, createdate, updatedate, create_id, update_id ) VALUES( #{empNo}, #{docTitle}, #{docContent}, #{category}, #{writer}, #{reference}, #{receiverTeam}, 'A0201', #{docStamp1}, #{docStamp2}, #{docStamp3}, now(), now(), #{empNo}, #{empNo} )

INSERT INTO document_leave( doc_no, leave_category, doc_leave_start_date, doc_leave_end_date, doc_leave_period_date, doc_leave_tel, createdate, updatedate, create_id, update_id ) VALUES( #{docNo}, #{leaveCategory}, #{docLeaveStartDate}, #{docLeaveEndDate}, #{docLeavePeriodDate}, #{docLeaveTel}, now(), now(), #{createId}, #{updateId} )

INSERT INTO document_reshuffle( doc_no, doc_reshuffle_date, doc_reshuffle_task, doc_reshuffle_result, doc_reshuffle_dept, doc_reshuffle_position, createdate, updatedate, create_id, update_id ) VALUES( #{docNo}, #{docReshuffleDate}, #{docReshuffleTask}, #{docReshuffleResult}, #{docReshuffleDept}, #{docReshufflePosition}, now(), now(), #{createId}, #{updateId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE document_default SET doc_title = #{docTitle}, doc_content = #{docContent}, reference = #{reference}, receiver_team = #{receiverTeam}, updatedate = now(), update_id = #{empNo} WHERE doc_no = #{docNo} AND emp_no = #{empNo}

UPATE document_leave SET leave = #{leave}, doc_leave_start_date = #{docLeaveStartDate}, doc_leave_end_date =#{docLeaveEndDate}, doc_leave_period_date = #{docLeavePeriodDate}, doc_leave_reason =#{docLeaveReason}, doc_leave_tel =#{docLeaveTel}, updatedate = now(), update_id = #{empNo} WHERE doc_no = #{docNo} AND emp_no = #{empNo}

UPDATE document_reshuffle SET doc_reshuffle_date = #{docReshuffleDate}, doc_reshuffle_task = #{docReshuffleTask}, doc_reshuffle_result = #{docReshuffleResult}, doc_reshuffle_dept = #{docReshuffleDept}, doc_reshuffle_position = #{docReshufflePosition}, doc_reshuffle_reason = #{docReshuffleReason}, updatedate = now(), update_id = #{empNo} WHERE doc_no = #{docNo} AND emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT doc_no docNo, emp_no empNo, category, doc_title docTitle, doc_content docContent, writer, reference, receiver_team receiverTeam, doc_status docStatus, createdate, updatedate, create_id createId, update_id updateId FROM document_default WHERE doc_no = #{docNo}

SELECT doc_no docNo, leave, doc_leave_start_date docLeaveStartDate, doc_leave_end_date docLeaveEndDate, doc_leave_period_date docLeavePeriodDate, doc_leave_reason docLeaveReason, doc_leave_tel docLeaveTel, createdate, updatedate, create_id createId, update_id updateId FROM document_leave WHERE doc_no = #{docNo}

SELECT doc_no docNo, doc_reshuffle_date docReshuffleDate, doc_reshuffle_task docReshuffleTask, doc_reshuffle_result docReshuffleResult, doc_reshuffle_dept docReshuffleDept, doc_reshuffle_position docReshufflePosition, doc_reshuffle_reason docReshuffleReason, createdate, updatedate, create_id createId, update_id updateId FROM document_reshuffle WHERE doc_no = #{docNo}
SELECT code, code_name codeName FROM common_code WHERE up_code = 'D01'

SELECT d.doc_no docNo, -- 문서번호 d.createdate, -- 기안일 d.writer, -- 기안자 d.doc_stamp1 docStamp1, -- 기안자 서명 d.doc_stamp2 docStamp2, -- 결재자 1 서명 d.doc_stamp3 docStamp3, -- 결재자 2 서명 reference_info.emp_name reference, -- 참조자 reference_info.emp_no referenceNo, -- 참조자 사번 rec.code_name receiverTeam, -- 수신팀 d.doc_title docTitle, -- 문서 제목 d.doc_content docContent, -- 문서 내용 dc.code_name dept, -- 기안 부서 pc.code_name position, -- 기안자 직급 f.doc_save_filename docSaveFileName, -- 첨부파일 저장명 f.doc_origin_filename docOriginFileName, -- 첨부파일 원본명 signer1_info.emp_name signer1Name, -- 결재자 1 사원명 signer1_info.emp_no signer1No, -- 결재자 1 사번 signer1_pc.code_name signer1Position, -- 결재자 1 직급 signer2_info.emp_name signer2Name, -- 결재자 2 사원명 signer2_info.emp_no signer2No, -- 결재자 2 사번 signer2_pc.code_name signer2Position -- 결재자 2 직급 FROM document_default d -- 기본 기안서 LEFT OUTER JOIN emp_info e ON d.emp_no = e.emp_no -- 사원 정보 LEFT OUTER JOIN document_file f ON d.doc_no = f.doc_no -- 첨부파일 LEFT OUTER JOIN document_signer ds1 ON d.doc_no = ds1.doc_no AND ds1.emp_signer_level = 1 -- 기안문서의 결재자 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN emp_info signer1_info ON ds1.emp_signer_no = signer1_info.emp_no -- 결재자 1의 사원정보 LEFT OUTER JOIN document_signer ds2 ON d.doc_no = ds2.doc_no AND ds2.emp_signer_level = 2 -- 기안문서의 결재자 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN emp_info signer2_info ON ds2.emp_signer_no = signer2_info.emp_no -- 결재자 2의 사원정보 LEFT OUTER JOIN emp_info reference_info ON d.reference = reference_info.emp_no -- 참조자 사원정보 LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code dc ON e.dept = dc.code -- 기안부서 code_name LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code pc ON e.position = pc.code -- 기안자 직급 code_name LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code rec ON d.receiver_team = rec.code -- 수신팀 code_name LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code signer1_pc ON signer1_info.position = signer1_pc.code -- 결재자1 code_name LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code signer2_pc ON signer2_info.position = signer2_pc.code -- 결재자2 code_name WHERE d.doc_no = #{docNo}
